name: COMMAND_INFO
description: Retrieve basic information about the Ryder.

name: COMMAND_RESTORE_FROM_SEED
description: Trigger restore mode via seed input. (Unimplemented.)

name: COMMAND_RESTORE_FROM_MNEMONIC
description: Trigger restore mode via mnemonic phrase input.

description: Request owner private key export. (Temporary prototype command, disabled.)

name: COMMAND_EXPORT_OWNER_APP_KEY_PRIVATE_KEY
description: Request owner private key and app private key. (Temporary prototype command for Stacks auth flow compatibility.)

name: COMMAND_EXPORT_PUBLIC_IDENTITIES
description: Export a series of public identities. (Unimplemented.)
